string.name: seed_angels
string.value: Elad Gil, Nat Friedman, Daniel Gross, Gokul Rajaram, Jeff Dean, Wei Guo, Naval

parameters.functionCode:
const angels = items[0].json.seed_angels.split(',').map(a => ({ name: a.trim() }));
return angels.map(a => ({ json: a }));

parameter.name: prompt
parameter.value: Find 30 recent portfolio companies for investor {{ $json.name }} in AI, SaaS, and Infra. Return a JSON list of company names.

parameter.name: prompt
parameter.value: Extract all named individual angel investors for the funding rounds of {{ $json.company_name }}. Exclude institutional VC funds. Return name and LinkedIn URL.
